snippet: LASKEY--Jay Lawrence, 89, of Woodmere, NY, loving father of Tom and Amy, dear father-in-law of Debbie Rothschild, adoring grandfather of Sam, and beloved brother of Joel, died on Friday, June 3, 2016 after a brief illness. Memorial service will be held June 7, 2016 3:00pm at Boulevard-Riverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway Hewlett, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LASKEY--Jay Lawrence, 89, of Woodmere, NY, loving father of Tom and Amy, dear father-in-law of Debbie Rothschild, adoring grandfather of Sam, and beloved brother of Joel, died on Friday, June 3, 2016 after a brief illness. Memorial service will be held June 7, 2016 3:00pm at Boulevard-Riverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway Hewlett, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LASKEY, JAY LAWRENCE
